r.s: Find out the minimum version and the extensions required for a piece of code to run
r.d: PHP_CompatInfo will parse a file/folder/script/array to find out the minimum version and extensions required for it to run. Features advanced debug output which shows which functions require which version and CLI output script
r.n:
* bugs - fixed bug #8559 : fails to scan if finds empty file in path - CLI version of PHP_CompatInfo won't print help usage more than once now - CLI version of PHP_CompatInfo is now compatible with Console_Table separator and multi-line cells support (requires version 1.0.4 or better)
* news - a launcher for windows user (compatinfo.bat) to run the CLI version of PHP_CompatInfo.
* improvements - better render of PHP_CompatInfo_CLI output by using Console_Table separator. - PHP_CompatInfo_CLI output is limited to 80 columns
